snippet.title: Gartic.io NEW APP!
snippet.description:
Gartic.io welcomes you with the fun of guessing and drawing! In each round, a player draws something for the others to guess what it is.

Choose one of the words to draw, and let the game begin! The player who achieves the points goal first gets the top place.

You can also choose from the available themes or even create your own room, inviting up to 50 friends by sharing the link.

- New Design! Smart and fresh layout.
- Lighter and improved user experience. Smoother than ever!
- Room search system with language and theme filters.
- Create rooms choosing the number of players, points goal, language, and official themes

Download it now!
Google Play - Android: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.gartic.Gartic
AppStore - iOS:
https://apps.apple.com/br/app/gartic-io/id1270393677
